group.name: Do you use Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch

plugin.name: Yes
plugin.description: These patches are meant to be used with the STEP build Dread's Skyrim Build. IMPORTANT! The Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch is required to use these patches.

plugin.name: No (quit)
plugin.description: These patches are meant to be used with the STEP build Dread's modlist. IMPORTANT! The Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch is required to use these patches.

fileDependency.file: Realistic AI Detection 2 SE - Medium Interior, Medium Exterior.esp

plugin.name: Aetherius - A Race and Standing Stone Overhaul
Disease Descriptions for the Immersive Adventurer
College of Winterhold The Missing Apprentices Quest Fix
The Gray Cowl of Nocturnal SE
More Radiant Quests for the Companions

fileDependency.file: More Radiant Quests for the Companions.esp

plugin.name: Cloaks of Skyrim and Winter is Coming
plugin.description: Install patches for both Cloaks of Skyrim and Winter is Coming. Make sure that you use both mods.

plugin.name: Animated Armoury
plugin.description: If both Heavy Armory and Animated Armoury are checked, a patch will be installed that rebalances Animated Armoury and Heavy Armoury against both each other as well as against vanilla Skyrim. The Halbards from Heavy Armory, which are shorter than Halbards from Animated Armory, will be renamed to Pole Axes (which is a real thing). The new animations from Animated Armoury will be applied to the new weapons from Heavy Armory, thus fixing some visual problems of some of Heavy Armory's new weapon types that used vanilla animations.

plugin.name: Heavy Armory - New Weapons
plugin.description: If both Heavy Armory and Animated Armoury are checked, a patch will be installed that rebalances Animated Armoury and Heavy Armoury against both each other as well as against vanilla Skyrim. The Halbards from Heavy Armory, which are shorter than Halbards from Animated Armory, will be renamed to Pole Axes (which is a real thing). The new animations from Animated Armoury will be applied to the new weapons from Heavy Armory, thus fixing some visual problems of some of Heavy Armory's new weapon types that used vanilla animations.

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim Cutting Room Floor Patch
Obscure's College of Winterhold Cell Settings
Luminosity Lighting Overhaul - The Cathedral Concept
OBIS SE - Organized Bandits In Skyrim
Tweaks to core game
plugin.description: Tweaks: - Timescale reduced from 20 to 15 - Chance of recovering arrors incresed from 33% to 50% - Greeting distance is reduced - Increased arrow speed - Cap to npc arrow dodging reduced to 66% from 100% - Fast travel speed fix. The correct ammount of time will pass as you fast travel. - NPC crime detection radius is decreased - Battle cry fix by NTense (open permissions) https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12133 - Don't talk with your mouth full (open permissions) https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17715 - NPC's moves further away and reacts faster when they are in the way

plugin.name: A Cathedralist's ENB - Stronger light sources
plugin.description: Choose this if you use A Cathedralist's ENB with the default quality preset. These tweaks are edits to the settings files for A Cathedralist's ENB. It tweaks point lighting making all light sources emit more light. It is highly recommended since some light sources seems to produce almost no light using the default settings combined with the lighting mods in the guide.

plugin.name: A Cathedralist's ENB High Quality - Stronger light sources
plugin.description: Choose this if you use A Cathedralist's ENB with the high quality preset. These tweaks are edits to the settings files for A Cathedralist's ENB. It tweaks point lighting making all light sources emit more light. It is highly recommended since some light sources seems to produce almost no light using the default settings combined with the lighting mods in the guide.

plugin.name: A Cathedralist's ENB - Vanilla lighting
plugin.description: Choose this if you use A Cathedralist's ENB with the default quality preset. These tweaks are edits to the settings files for A Cathedralist's ENB. It resets lighting strength to vanilla. It is recommended if you want stealth to behave as intended. Darkness caused by ENB is not taken into account when calculating if enemies sees you or not.

plugin.name: A Cathedralist's ENB High Quality - Vanilla lighting
plugin.description: Choose this if you use A Cathedralist's ENB with the high quality preset. These tweaks are edits to the settings files for A Cathedralist's ENB. It resets lighting strength to vanilla. It is recommended if you want stealth to behave as intended. Darkness caused by ENB is not taken into account when calculating if enemies sees you or not.

plugin.name: None
plugin.description: Choose this if you do not use an ENB or do not want the tweaked ENB settings files.

plugin.name: Slower skill gain
plugin.description: Tweaks: - Skills capped at 100, like in the vanilla game - Skills level at 50% - 5 carry weight gained if stamina is increased when leveling up, like in the vanilla game - Legendary skills are turned off

plugin.name: Slower skill gain without grinding
plugin.description: This is a custom Skyrim Uncapper settings and my personal preference. It is recommended to tweak the Uncapper settings yourselves. Tweaks: - Skills capped at 100 - Skills level at 50% speed except smithing, alchemy and pickpocket which level at 200% speed - 5 carry weight gained if stamina is increased when leveling up, like in vanilla - Legendary skills are turned off

file.source: Uncapper ini alternatives/50% leveling + no grinding/SkyrimUncapper.ini

plugin.name: Creation Club Survival Mode - No carry weight penalty
plugin.description: This tweak removes the carry weight penalty from the Creation Club Survival Mode.

plugin.name: EVG Conditional Idles - The Frozen North fix
plugin.description: This fix makes EVG conditional idles compatible with the Frozen North.

plugin.name: Experience settings
plugin.description: This is a settings file for the mod Experience. It enables experience gain from miscellaneous quests and from killing enemies. This also installs a patch for Experience to allow miscellaneous from killing enemies added by other mods included in this modlist.

plugin.name: Higher Bounty Rewards
plugin.description:
Alex's Higher Bounty Rewards lite is a mod that increases the rewrds for certain quests:
- Bandit Camp: 1000 gold - Forsworn Camp: 1500 gold - Giants: 2500 gold - Dragons: 7500 gold
Since the mod only alters values in four records in Skyrim.esm, it is impossible to patch without making the mod redundant. These patched plugins therefore replaces the original mod.
Please download and endorse the original mod, but do not install it: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11294

plugin.name: No leveled unique items
plugin.description: No more low level unique items. Unique items in Skyrim actually exists as different versions with different levels. If you discover an item when your character is at a lower level, you will get a lower level version of that item. This setting removes that feature. From now on you will get the most powerfull version of all unique items you find.

plugin.name: Slower leveling for Experience
plugin.description: This edits fXPLevelUpBase and fXPLevelUpMult to slow down character level gain to 50%. It is recommended to slow down skill gain using one of the uncapper settings provided above or creating a settings file yourself.

plugin.name: TDN Equipable Horns SE Tweaks
plugin.description: This makes all equipable horns from the mod free to craft.
